deity: Stag Mother of the Forest of Stones
deity_markdown: [Camazotz](/Deities.aspx?ID=334), [Diomazul](/Deities.aspx?ID=614), [Doloras](/Deities.aspx?ID=589), [Enkaar](/Deities.aspx?ID=657), [Eyes That Watch](/Deities.aspx?ID=658), [Grasping Iovett](/Deities.aspx?ID=659), [Groetus](/Deities.aspx?ID=345), [Husk](/Deities.aspx?ID=660), [Lady Razor](/Deities.aspx?ID=661), [Nergal](/Deities.aspx?ID=529), [Reshmit of the Heavy Voice](/Deities.aspx?ID=662), [Shax](/Deities.aspx?ID=435), [Stag Mother of the Forest of Stones](/Deities.aspx?ID=609), [Thalaphyrr](/Deities.aspx?ID=663), [The Pale Horse](/Deities.aspx?ID=545), [Venkelvore](/Deities.aspx?ID=506), [Vildeis](/Deities.aspx?ID=487), [Zon-Kuthon](/Deities.aspx?ID=296)
markdown:
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 349 2.0 **Tradition** [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) **Bloodline** [Aberrant](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=19) **Deities** [Camazotz](/Deities.aspx?ID=334), [Diomazul](/Deities.aspx?ID=614), [Doloras](/Deities.aspx?ID=589), [Enkaar](/Deities.aspx?ID=657), [Eyes That Watch](/Deities.aspx?ID=658), [Grasping Iovett](/Deities.aspx?ID=659), [Groetus](/Deities.aspx?ID=345), [Husk](/Deities.aspx?ID=660), [Lady Razor](/Deities.aspx?ID=661), [Nergal](/Deities.aspx?ID=529), [Reshmit of the Heavy Voice](/Deities.aspx?ID=662), [Shax](/Deities.aspx?ID=435), [Stag Mother of the Forest of Stones](/Deities.aspx?ID=609), [Thalaphyrr](/Deities.aspx?ID=663), [The Pale Horse](/Deities.aspx?ID=545), [Venkelvore](/Deities.aspx?ID=506), [Vildeis](/Deities.aspx?ID=487), [Zon-Kuthon](/Deities.aspx?ID=296) **Lesson** [Lesson of Vengeance](/Lessons.aspx?ID=20) **Range** 30 feet **Target** 1 creature **Defense** Will **Duration** 1 minute --- Illusory pain wracks the target, dealing 2d4 mental damage and 1d4 [persistent mental damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) with a Will save. **Critical Success** The target is unaffected.
**Success** The target takes full initial damage but no persistent damage, and the spell ends immediately.
**Failure** The target takes full initial and persistent damage, and the target is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34). If the target recovers from being sickened, the persistent damage ends and the spell ends.
**Critical Failure** As failure, but the target is sickened 2. --- **Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d4 and the persistent damage by 1d4.
name: Phantom Pain

[Camazotz](/Deities.aspx?ID=334), [Diomazul](/Deities.aspx?ID=614), [Doloras](/Deities.aspx?ID=589), [Enkaar](/Deities.aspx?ID=657), [Eyes That Watch](/Deities.aspx?ID=658), [Grasping Iovett](/Deities.aspx?ID=659), [Groetus](/Deities.aspx?ID=345), [Husk](/Deities.aspx?ID=660), [Lady Razor](/Deities.aspx?ID=661), [Nergal](/Deities.aspx?ID=529), [Reshmit of the Heavy Voice](/Deities.aspx?ID=662), [Shax](/Deities.aspx?ID=435), [Stag Mother of the Forest of Stones](/Deities.aspx?ID=609), [Thalaphyrr](/Deities.aspx?ID=663), [The Pale Horse](/Deities.aspx?ID=545), [Venkelvore](/Deities.aspx?ID=506), [Vildeis](/Deities.aspx?ID=487), [Zon-Kuthon](/Deities.aspx?ID=296)

**Lesson**
[Lesson of Vengeance](/Lessons.aspx?ID=20)

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

 

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
Will

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Cause a creature ongoing pain that sickens it.
</summary>
summary: Cause a creature ongoing pain that sickens it.
summary_markdown: Cause a creature ongoing pain that sickens it.
text: Phantom Pain Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 349 2.0 Tradition Occult Bloodline Aberrant Deities Camazotz, Diomazul, Doloras, Enkaar, Eyes That Watch, Grasping Iovett, Groetus, Husk, Lady Razor, Nergal, Reshmit of the Heavy Voice, Shax, Stag Mother of the Forest of Stones, Thalaphyrr, The Pale Horse, Venkelvore, Vildeis, Zon-Kuthon Lesson Lesson of Vengeance Range 30 feet Target 1 creature Defense Will Duration 1 minute --- Illusory pain wracks the target, dealing 2d4 mental damage and 1d4 persistent mental damage with a Will save. Critical Success The target is unaffected. Success The target takes full initial damage but no persistent damage, and the spell ends immediately. Failure The target takes full initial and persistent damage, and the target is sickened 1. If the target recovers from being sickened, the persistent damage ends and the spell ends. Critical Failure As failure, but the target is sickened 2. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d4 and the persistent damage by 1d4.
